hero.title: Master your chess opening repertoire with spaced repetition!
hero.subtitle: LinePrep helps you learn and memorize chess openings through interactive practice sessions. Build your repertoire, track your progress, and never forget your lines again.

spacedRepetition.title: Spaced Repetition
spacedRepetition.description: Practice positions you struggle with more often. Our smart algorithm helps you retain openings in long-term memory.

database.title: Comprehensive Database
database.description: Access a complete database of chess openings or create your own custom lines to practice your personal repertoire.

stacks.title: Learning Stacks
stacks.description: Organize openings into themed collections. Group by playing style, opponent strength, or tournament preparation.

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Detailed statistics show your accuracy, practice streaks, and areas that need more work. Watch yourself improve over time.

interactive.title: Interactive Practice
interactive.description: Practice with a real chessboard interface. Get instant feedback on your moves and learn from your mistakes.

custom.title: Custom Openings
custom.description: Build and practice your own opening variations. Perfect for preparing against specific opponents or trying new ideas.

step1.title: Choose Your Openings
step1.description: Browse our opening database or create custom lines. Select the openings you want to learn and add them to your practice queue.

step2.title: Practice Interactively
step2.description: Play through positions on an interactive chessboard. LinePrep presents you with positions and tests your knowledge of the correct moves.

step3.title: Track & Improve
step3.description: Monitor your accuracy and progress over time. Review statistics to identify weak spots and focus your practice where it matters most.

cta.title: Ready to Master Your Openings?
cta.subtitle: Join chess players who are improving their opening knowledge with LinePrep
